page.title: 05PUB GAMES IN PONTESBURY
page.content:
The Red Lion public house in Pontesbury has many entertainments, including fruit machines, pool tables, dominoes, darts and juke boxes. They have competitions for pool, dominoes and darts which are played on a league basis at home and away. There are both ladies' and mens' teams which play against other pubs in the area.
There is a television behind the bar and a jukebox in the bar which are both very popular, but they do not have any live entertainment in the pub. The Landlord thinks that entertainment and games are an important part of the pub scene and attract people to his pub. His patrons prefer competitive games like pool, darts and dominoes rather than arcade games where they play by themselves against a machine.
